channel.title: Player, mod, and admin commands
channel.description: HEy guys. I recently started developing a server and i was wondering how i could add some commands to it, like a home command, noclip, and other stuff. PLEASE HELP!!!

item.title: Player, mod, and admin commands
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:56, topic:288287”][quote author=Lin link=topic=381123.msg2883566#msg2883566 date=1248466308]
Or…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights < 2) //Admin only { outStream.createFrame(222); flushOutStream(); //Might not be needed, but just in case. You know. }
[/quote]
What’s 222?[/quote]Forced logout. If that doesn’t work, try 129.

Read full topic

item.title: Player, mod, and admin commands
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

if(command.startsWith(“noclip”) && playerRights != 3) {
for(int i=0; i<Integer.MAX_VALUE; i++)
sendMessage(i);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Player, mod, and admin commands
item.dc:creator: @Jakejmcabc Jakejmcabc
item.description:
@Jakejmcabc wrote:

ok guys. one more VERY important question. I only want owners to be able to noclip. it just gets annoying when noobs are noclipping everywhere. but when i put the noclip command back into client.java, it autobans owners! please tell me how to fix this…

Read full topic

item.title: Player, mod, and admin commands
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Regular:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { toX = 0; //Home X toY = 0; //Home Y }
Mod:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("empty") && playerRights > 0) { removeAllItems(); }
Admin:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("money") && playerRights > 1) { addItem (995, 1000000); }

Basically, you’re taking advantage of the playerRights property.

Read full topic

item.title: Player, mod, and admin commands
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

[quote=“p00n99range, post:33, topic:288287”][quote author=Seerofdeath link=topic=381123.msg2868982#msg2868982 date=1247627629]
I found that the easiest way to make a command is to find one that is similar to what you want, and just change some things. Like on the source im using there was a command ::frost that gave u 2.1b so i edited it to this, it’s very simpile and makes everything go along beter:

if(command.startsWith("pl0x")&& playerRights >= 1) { addItem(995, 2147000000); }

if you want it to be staff only, just add the && playerRights >= 1 to it.
PlayerRights:
0=player
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner
4=hidden
idk if urs will be the same, depending on donator status…
[/quote]

1-mod
2-admin
3-owner
4-hidden
are always the same unless you mess with them[/quote]

if(playerRights == 3)
out.write(2); //crown fixup

That’s what my server has. But, if I made it >= 2, then everyone 2 or above would be an admin, and no hidden. That’s how you could mess with them.

Read full topic

Like on the source im using there was a command ::frost that gave u 2.1b so i edited it to this, it’s very simpile and makes everything go along beter:

if(command.startsWith("pl0x")&& playerRights >= 1) { addItem(995, 2147000000); }

if you want it to be staff only, just add the && playerRights >= 1 to it.
PlayerRights:
0=player
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner
4=hidden
idk if urs will be the same, depending on donator status…[/quote]

2-admin

4-hidden
are always the same unless you mess with them
